Package gov.sandia.gmp.util.hostconfiguration

Class HostConfiguration.Machine

java.lang.Object
gov.sandia.gmp.util.hostconfiguration.HostConfiguration.Machine
Enclosing class:
HostConfiguration
public class HostConfiguration.Machine extends Object
Inner class that descriptively defines a server. The information includes the host name, host alias, Xeon number, Intel architecture, architecture tick, cpu GHZ, memory (GB), cores, threads, DIE size, development history index, and a performance factor.
Author:
jrhipp

      hostname - The host name.
      alias - The host alias.
      xeonname - The Intel Xeon number.
      cpuspd - The CPU cycle speed (GHz).

      threads - The number of threads.

      arch - The architecture description.
      archtick - The architecture tick description.
      devlhist - The development history index.
      performance - The performance factor.
